# RegisterService

**Instance Method**

Starts the registration process for the service and performs any additional matching.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t RegisterService();
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] on success, or another value if an error occurs. For a list of error codes, see [doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/error-codes].

## Discussion

After setting up your service in your custom [doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/IOService/Start] method, call this method to let the system know your service is running.

## Registering the Service with IOKit

- **SetName**: Sets the name of the service in the system’s registry.
- **GetRegistryEntryID**: Returns the registry ID for the current service.
- **IOServiceName**: A string type for setting the name of the service in the system’s registry.
